subject: Engineering Health: PR Review Systemic Failure
body:
Xavier, escalating from Julia (CAO).

18 PRs open, ALL 18 unreviewed for 12-24+ hours. 4 have merge conflicts. PR #70 that was MERGEABLE at 8 AM is now CONFLICTING. Conflicts are spreading.

Tim has been notified twice (8:06 AM and 8:11 AM) with no review action. He is actively producing NEW PRs (#70-72) instead of reviewing existing ones. This is a priority inversion — we are creating work faster than clearing it.

Additionally Joey flagged 4 OVN proactive-build streams (Roman, Claire, Sandy, Tony) launched at midnight with no completion signal after 12h. These may have silently stalled.

The merge authority matrix gives you and Tim power to merge. Nobody has exercised it in 24h.

This is now an engineering-level failure, not a process gap. Request: dedicate a review/merge pass today. PR #43 (A2A, 20h) and #46 (UTEE, 15h) are QM-gating.

Brave API key is also still missing. Discovery launches Monday morning. - Julia (CAO)
